$interpreted: Sione: (How's it this hot already? We haven't even gotten into the pool yet...)
Nolva: Oof...
Sione: Are you sure you're up to this? You ate a barrel-load of chilis last night...
Nolva: One of the vendors gave me a salve for the spice, I feel much better already.
Nolva: I'm sorry that you had to take care of me...
Sione: Don't worry about it. I'm just glad you're okay.
Overcooked Challenger: It feels like the air's burning up in here! I-I-I'm out!
Innkeeper's Representative: Yup, this onsen is our hotel's pride and beauty~

Innkeeper's Representative: It's made from the convergence of a volcanic spring with the Limpid River. There's a sluice up top that controls the inflow of cold river water, so we can keep the pool piping hot all year round!
Innkeeper's Representative: And not only that...
Innkeeper's Representative: We're proud to have the people's favorite thespian Miss Chiyuki as one of our most loyal clientele!!
Excited Challenger: Just imagine sharing a hot spring with Miss Chiyuki! I can hardly wait!
Passionate Challenger: Once we've finished bathing, will our skin be just as silky and smooth as hers?~
Innkeeper's Representative: Izumi and I will oversee this competition. Anyone who faints or leaves the pool will be disqualified!
Innkeeper's Representative: I hereby proclaim~ The Grand Hot Spring Contest has officially begun!
Sione: ...Any leads so far?
Incognito Soldier: Last night, one of the smuggling groups we've infiltrated received a message... It's just as you predicted. The sellers have called the deal off.
Sione: And at such short notice. Looks like this has something to do with the change of management... Have you been able to follow up on the news?
Incognito Soldier: I'm afraid not. The sellers are extremely prudent, and we've lost their tail... But we know they're somewhere in the hotel!
Sione: If the suspect's someone at the hotel, then—
Sione: ...Proceed as planned. Make an excuse to leave and follow up on every suspicious character in the hotel. Let's move out.
Incognito Soldier: —Yes, Ma'am!
Big Bro: Hurry! Get those fainters off to safety!
Nolva: What's happened? So many contestants have been eliminated...
Sione: Yup, tens of challengers have been disqualified already.
Sione: Generally speaking, symptoms of heat stress...
Sione: Shouldn't include masses of people all passing out at once together...
Nolva: Sione, are you okay? Your face is pretty red.
Sione: (Gah... It's so hot I can't even think straight. I'll have to go through a few more rounds of heat training once I get back...)
Nolva: What you said's now got me thinking—
Nolva: Why's everyone who leaves the pool appearing to come from over there? Could it be that the water there is... hotter... somehow?
Sione: No, we're closer here to the volcanic spring source. And it looks like it's something other than the temperature that's caused them to leave...
Sione: (Could it be... Somebody's using spring dust!?)
Sione: Excuse me, I have something that needs attending to!
Nolva: Huh? Uh... Okay...
Izumi: So, while I've been away... It seems business has been better and better at the hotel, no? It seems you students have become the masters~
Innkeeper's Representative: You've taught us so well, boss!
Izumi: Oh, I can't take all the credit, can I? There must be a trick or two that you didn't learn from me!
Izumi: Such as... Ah, a little bird told me recently that the Spring Waters have been welcoming a number of VIPs~
Innkeeper's Representative: Ohh! Nothing escapes Master Izumi's eyes and ears!

Innkeeper's Representative: We've designed a special plan for our most distinguished and esteemed guests. We never expected to have such an enthusiastic response. They don't even want to return home again~
Izumi: That explains it~~
Izumi: Hmm, that's wonderful! As long as there's nothing criminal of which to speak~ Otherwise, how could I ever show my face on Hot Spring Street again?
Innkeeper's Representative: Absolutely not! We'd never dare to dabble in such dastardly deeds!
Overcooked Challenger: Gwaaah, there's plenty of people passed out over here, too!
Innkeeper's Representative: Quick! Go check it out!
Yao: (...I was right. The criminal's out to steal the management rights.)
Yao: (They've been switching things up just to cover their tracks, but drugs are unpredictable and hard to control.)
Yao: (All we have to do is follow where all these unconscious contestants take us, and we'll soon catch 'em up in no time—)
Sione: (Who's this here... That suspicious-looking guy from yesterday?)
Sione: (He's ferocious! All this, just to best the competition... Unless—he seriously wants them dead!?)
Yao: Gotcha...
Frail Young Lady: Oof...
Yao: (Perfect timing. Unless...)
Sione: (Would he kill, just to secure victory... He's certainly real sus—)
Big Bro: There's another group drowning over there!? Quick, go save 'em!
Frail Young Lady: (Was that surprise attack just now a coincidence... Or is somebody onto me? If that's the case... I'll just have to be more cautious.)
Overcooked Challenger: Gyaaah! Rockslide! RUN!
Sione: Rockslide?
Sione: Nolva... Nolva!?
Sione: Watch out—
Nolva: Oof... phew...
Nolva: Guh... gahh~
Nolva: Huh?
Nolva: ...Uh, I...
Nolva: I'm sorry... Am I disturbing you?
Nolva: Eh? You've come here on an investigation...!?
Nolva: But if you're here to put a stop to shady dealings... Then why'd you join the hot spring competition?
Sione: —It was a necessity. I'd planned to find an excuse to get out of there as soon as it started...
Nolva: But as you were saying... Did you discover anyone using drugs?
Sione: Yes.
Sione: When I was following the leads... I started to get suspicious about this man.
Yao: Hmph? That's funny. I was having my doubts about you.
Sione: ......
Nolva: U-uh... You two... Let's all get something to eat~ You must be starving, right?
Nolva: (—That reminds me...)
Nolva: Excuse me~ Sorry to bother you...
Nolva: But may I borrow that weapon of yours for a moment?
Nolva: ...Hey~ Yaagh!
Sione: Uhh, why exactly... are you carrying fresh eggs with you?
Nolva: Actually, I've always wanted to try cooking a hot spring egg. I was planning to secretly snack on them during the competition, but I dozed off...
Nolva: Sorry, it's weird, I know.
Sione: No, on the contrary...
Sione: It's... delicious!!
Nolva: R-really!? That's awesome~ Want another—
Yao: ...One more.
Nolva: Okay~ Just a moment...
???: That smells amazing~ Can I join too?
Nolva: W-what a pretty girl...
Sione: And you are?
Beyata: Beyata, Bluebird of the Hundred Lillies Guesthouse.
Beyata: Yao helped me out with a little mishap, so I was thinking... Maybe I could give him something in return, but looks like it won't be necessary~
Nolva: A little... mishap? You don't mean...
Beyata: It's spring dust—Huh? You mean you two don't know?
Sione: I'm sorry, could you be a little more specific...!
Beyata: For a while now, all the beauties of Hot Spring Street have been losing their customers to that spring dust...
Beyata: There's nothing we can do about it, such a shame~~
Beyata: So I've asked Yao to investigate for us and bring the culprits to rough justice.
Nolva: You mean Yao's here just like Sione... to ferret out the criminals?
Yao: How long have you been eavesdropping on us? And who gave you permission to blow my cover?
Beyata: Huh? I don't understand~ Aren't you innocent, too, Yao...?
Sione: That being the case... I must apologize for my rash behavior earlier.
Yao: You needn't.
Yao: The culprit is young, frail, and has a purple scar across the face. Since we're all at the hot springs, it's very likely they'll be out to win the competition.
Sione: So, maybe that means tomorrow we'll...
Yao: There's no "we" here. I've told you what you want to know. But I work alone.
Nolva: Y-Yao!?
Nolva: (Just when I thought we were getting a little closer...)
Beyata: Gee, good times just don't last, do they~
Beyata: I've got other things to be taking care of~ Please excuse me... Wishing you both sweet dreams...
Nolva: (...Who'd have thought that something so sordid could be going down at such a beautiful spot...)
Nolva: Sione... Uh, I...
Nolva: ...Can I help you out somehow?
Izumi: Hmm... Come in~
Izumi: Mmm... With those three demihumans in such dire straits, surely Nigel will agree to go back East with me?
Izumi: Just imagine what the future holds for the East now... Sounds like a lotta fun~
Izumi: You've done well, thank you~
Beyata: There's no greater pleasure than to be able to be of help...
Izumi: Oh right~ I almost forgot!
Izumi: ...I want you to take ~good~ care of the Spring Waters manager and her lackeys...

Model.Text: (How's it this hot already? We haven't even gotten into the pool yet...)
Oof...
Are you sure you're up to this? You ate a barrel-load of chilis last night...
One of the vendors gave me a salve for the spice, I feel much better already.
I'm sorry that you had to take care of me...
Don't worry about it. I'm just glad you're okay.
It feels like the air's burning up in here! I-I-I'm out!
Yup, this onsen is our hotel's pride and beauty~
It's made from the convergence of a volcanic spring with the Limpid River. There's a sluice up top that controls the inflow of cold river water, so we can keep the pool piping hot all year round!
And not only that...
We're proud to have the people's favorite thespian Miss Chiyuki as one of our most loyal clientele!!
Just imagine sharing a hot spring with Miss Chiyuki! I can hardly wait!
Once we've finished bathing, will our skin be just as silky and smooth as hers?~
Izumi and I will oversee this competition. Anyone who faints or leaves the pool will be disqualified!
I hereby proclaim~ The Grand Hot Spring Contest has officially begun!
...Any leads so far?
Last night, one of the smuggling groups we've infiltrated received a message... It's just as you predicted. The sellers have called the deal off.
And at such short notice. Looks like this has something to do with the change of management... Have you been able to follow up on the news?
I'm afraid not. The sellers are extremely prudent, and we've lost their tail... But we know they're somewhere in the hotel!
If the suspect's someone at the hotel, then—
...Proceed as planned. Make an excuse to leave and follow up on every suspicious character in the hotel. Let's move out.
—Yes, Ma'am!
Hurry! Get those fainters off to safety!
What's happened? So many contestants have been eliminated...
Yup, tens of challengers have been disqualified already.
Generally speaking, symptoms of heat stress...
Shouldn't include masses of people all passing out at once together...
Sione, are you okay? Your face is pretty red.
(Gah... It's so hot I can't even think straight. I'll have to go through a few more rounds of heat training once I get back...)
What you said's now got me thinking—
Why's everyone who leaves the pool appearing to come from over there? Could it be that the water there is... hotter... somehow?
No, we're closer here to the volcanic spring source. And it looks like it's something other than the temperature that's caused them to leave...
(Could it be... Somebody's using spring dust!?)
Excuse me, I have something that needs attending to!
Huh? Uh... Okay...
So, while I've been away... It seems business has been better and better at the hotel, no? It seems you students have become the masters~
You've taught us so well, boss!
Oh, I can't take all the credit, can I? There must be a trick or two that you didn't learn from me!
Such as... Ah, a little bird told me recently that the Spring Waters have been welcoming a number of VIPs~
Ohh! Nothing escapes Master Izumi's eyes and ears!
We've designed a special plan for our most distinguished and esteemed guests. We never expected to have such an enthusiastic response. They don't even want to return home again~
That explains it~~
Hmm, that's wonderful! As long as there's nothing criminal of which to speak~ Otherwise, how could I ever show my face on Hot Spring Street again?
Absolutely not! We'd never dare to dabble in such dastardly deeds!
Gwaaah, there's plenty of people passed out over here, too!
Quick! Go check it out!
(...I was right. The criminal's out to steal the management rights.)
(They've been switching things up just to cover their tracks, but drugs are unpredictable and hard to control.)
(All we have to do is follow where all these unconscious contestants take us, and we'll soon catch 'em up in no time—)
(Who's this here... That suspicious-looking guy from yesterday?)
(He's ferocious! All this, just to best the competition... Unless—he seriously wants them dead!?)
Gotcha...
Oof...
(Perfect timing. Unless...)
(Would he kill, just to secure victory... He's certainly real sus—)
There's another group drowning over there!? Quick, go save 'em!
(Was that surprise attack just now a coincidence... Or is somebody onto me? If that's the case... I'll just have to be more cautious.)
Gyaaah! Rockslide! RUN!
Rockslide?
Nolva... Nolva!?
Watch out—
Oof... phew...
Guh... gahh~
Huh?
I'm sorry... Am I disturbing you?
Eh? You've come here on an investigation...!?
But if you're here to put a stop to shady dealings... Then why'd you join the hot spring competition?
—It was a necessity. I'd planned to find an excuse to get out of there as soon as it started...
But as you were saying... Did you discover anyone using drugs?
Yes.
When I was following the leads... I started to get suspicious about this man.
Hmph? That's funny. I was having my doubts about you.
U-uh... You two... Let's all get something to eat~ You must be starving, right?
(—That reminds me...)
Excuse me~ Sorry to bother you...
But may I borrow that weapon of yours for a moment?
...Hey~ Yaagh!
Uhh, why exactly... are you carrying fresh eggs with you?
Actually, I've always wanted to try cooking a hot spring egg. I was planning to secretly snack on them during the competition, but I dozed off...
Sorry, it's weird, I know.
No, on the contrary...
It's... delicious!!
R-really!? That's awesome~ Want another—
...One more.
Okay~ Just a moment...
That smells amazing~ Can I join too?
W-what a pretty girl...
And you are?
Beyata, Bluebird of the Hundred Lillies Guesthouse.
Yao helped me out with a little mishap, so I was thinking... Maybe I could give him something in return, but looks like it won't be necessary~
A little... mishap? You don't mean...
It's spring dust—Huh? You mean you two don't know?
I'm sorry, could you be a little more specific...!
For a while now, all the beauties of Hot Spring Street have been losing their customers to that spring dust...
There's nothing we can do about it, such a shame~~
So I've asked Yao to investigate for us and bring the culprits to rough justice.
You mean Yao's here just like Sione... to ferret out the criminals?
How long have you been eavesdropping on us? And who gave you permission to blow my cover?
Huh? I don't understand~ Aren't you innocent, too, Yao...?
That being the case... I must apologize for my rash behavior earlier.
You needn't.
The culprit is young, frail, and has a purple scar across the face. Since we're all at the hot springs, it's very likely they'll be out to win the competition.
So, maybe that means tomorrow we'll...
There's no "we" here. I've told you what you want to know. But I work alone.
Y-Yao!?
(Just when I thought we were getting a little closer...)
Gee, good times just don't last, do they~
I've got other things to be taking care of~ Please excuse me... Wishing you both sweet dreams...
(...Who'd have thought that something so sordid could be going down at such a beautiful spot...)
Sione... Uh, I...
...Can I help you out somehow?
Hmm... Come in~
Mmm... With those three demihumans in such dire straits, surely Nigel will agree to go back East with me?
Just imagine what the future holds for the East now... Sounds like a lotta fun~
You've done well, thank you~
There's no greater pleasure than to be able to be of help...
Oh right~ I almost forgot!
...I want you to take ~good~ care of the Spring Waters manager and her lackeys...

There must be a trick or two that you didn't learn from me!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Such as... Ah, a little bird told me recently that the Spring Waters have been welcoming a number of VIPs~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Innkeeper's Representative","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3661c3","IconName":"h3661c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ohh! Nothing escapes Master Izumi's eyes and ears!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Innkeeper's Representative","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3661c3","IconName":"h3661c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We've designed a special plan for our most distinguished and esteemed guests. We never expected to have such an enthusiastic response. They don't even want to return home again~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That explains it~~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmm, that's wonderful! As long as there's nothing criminal of which to speak~ Otherwise, how could I ever show my face on Hot Spring Street again?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Innkeeper's Representative","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3661c3","IconName":"h3661c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Absolutely not! We'd never dare to dabble in such dastardly deeds!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Overcooked Challenger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3552c3","IconName":"h3552c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gwaaah, there's plenty of people passed out over here, too!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Innkeeper's Representative","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3661c3","IconName":"h3661c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Quick! Go check it out!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...I was right. The criminal's out to steal the management rights.)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(They've been switching things up just to cover their tracks, but drugs are unpredictable and hard to control.)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(All we have to do is follow where all these unconscious contestants take us, and we'll soon catch 'em up in no time\u2014)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Who's this here... That suspicious-looking guy from yesterday?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(He's ferocious! All this, just to best the competition... Unless\u2014he seriously wants them dead!?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gotcha...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Frail Young Lady","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3664c3","IconName":"h3664c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oof...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Perfect timing. Unless...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Would he kill, just to secure victory... He's certainly real sus\u2014)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Big Bro","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3662c3","IconName":"h3662c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There's another group drowning over there!? Quick, go save 'em!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Frail Young Lady","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3664c3","IconName":"h3664c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Was that surprise attack just now a coincidence... Or is somebody onto me? If that's the case... I'll just have to be more cautious.)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Overcooked Challenger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3216c4","IconName":"h3216c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gyaaah! Rockslide! RUN!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Rockslide?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nolva... Nolva!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Watch out\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oof... phew...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Guh... gahh~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Huh?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Uh, I...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry... Am I disturbing you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh? You've come here on an investigation...!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But if you're here to put a stop to shady dealings... Then why'd you join the hot spring competition?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014It was a necessity. I'd planned to find an excuse to get out of there as soon as it started...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_37_002","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But as you were saying... Did you discover anyone using drugs?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_37_003","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yes.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"When I was following the leads... I started to get suspicious about this man.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph? That's funny. I was having my doubts about you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"U-uh... You two... Let's all get something to eat~ You must be starving, right?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(\u2014That reminds me...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Excuse me~ Sorry to bother you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But may I borrow that weapon of yours for a moment?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Hey~ Yaagh!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Uhh, why exactly... are you carrying fresh eggs with you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Actually, I've always wanted to try cooking a hot spring egg. I was planning to secretly snack on them during the competition, but I dozed off...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_44_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sorry, it's weird, I know.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_44_002","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No, on the contrary...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's... delicious!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_46_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"R-really!? That's awesome~ Want another\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_46_001","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...One more.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_47_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay~ Just a moment...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_47_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That smells amazing~ Can I join too?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_48_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"W-what a pretty girl...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_48_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And you are?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_48_002","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Beyata, Bluebird of the Hundred Lillies Guesthouse.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_49_000","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yao helped me out with a little mishap, so I was thinking... Maybe I could give him something in return, but looks like it won't be necessary~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_49_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A little... mishap? You don't mean...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_49_002","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's spring dust\u2014Huh? You mean you two don't know?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_50_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry, could you be a little more specific...!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_51_000","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"For a while now, all the beauties of Hot Spring Street have been losing their customers to that spring dust...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_51_001","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There's nothing we can do about it, such a shame~~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_51_002","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So I've asked Yao to investigate for us and bring the culprits to rough justice.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_51_003","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You mean Yao's here just like Sione... to ferret out the criminals?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_52_000","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How long have you been eavesdropping on us? And who gave you permission to blow my cover?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_52_001","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Huh? I don't understand~ Aren't you innocent, too, Yao...?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_53_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That being the case... I must apologize for my rash behavior earlier.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_53_001","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You needn't.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_54_000","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The culprit is young, frail, and has a purple scar across the face. Since we're all at the hot springs, it's very likely they'll be out to win the competition.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_55_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0249","IconName":"h0249s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, maybe that means tomorrow we'll...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_55_001","SpeakerName":"Yao","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0246","IconName":"t0246s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There's no \"we\" here. I've told you what you want to know. But I work alone.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_56_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Y-Yao!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_57_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Just when I thought we were getting a little closer...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_57_001","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gee, good times just don't last, do they~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_58_000","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I've got other things to be taking care of~ Please excuse me... Wishing you both sweet dreams...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_59_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...Who'd have thought that something so sordid could be going down at such a beautiful spot...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_60_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sione... Uh, I...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_60_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0248","IconName":"h0248s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Can I help you out somehow?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_61_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmm... Come in~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_62_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mmm... With those three demihumans in such dire straits, surely Nigel will agree to go back East with me?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_62_001","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just imagine what the future holds for the East now... Sounds like a lotta fun~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_63_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've done well, thank you~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_63_001","SpeakerName":"Beyata","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0190","IconName":"h0190s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There's no greater pleasure than to be able to be of help...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_64_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh right~ I almost forgot!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_036_004_dialog_english##_65_000","SpeakerName":"Izumi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0247","IconName":"h0247s5_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I want you to take ~good~ care of the Spring Waters manager and her lackeys...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
